titleStmt.title: To the Jews natural, and to the Jews spiritual with a few words ro [sic] England my native country, &c. : some sensible, weighty queries, concerning some things very sweet and necessary to be experienced in the truly-Christian state : whereunto is added a postscript, containing some queries on Isa. 50, 10, 11 ... / by Isaac Penington.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Added extra t.p.: To the Jews natural, and to the Jews spiritual ... / written in traveling bowels by Isaac Penington.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
